items.content_html: A lightweight, unopinionated, zero dependency command menu for React
items.title: vgarmes/cmdk-lite: A lightweight, unopinionated, zero dependency command menu for React

items.content_html: DotenvPlus is a lightweight, developer-friendly utility for validating, parsing, and managing environment variables in TypeScript apps. Combining dotenv for seamless loading and Zod for schema-based validation, it offers type-safe, reliable configuration management, reducing errors from missing or mistyped variables.
items.title: RajMazumder18110/DotenvPlus: DotenvPlus is a lightweight, developer-friendly utility for validating, parsing, and managing environment variables in TypeScript apps. Combining dotenv for seamless loading and Zod for schema-based validation, it offers type-safe, reliable configuration management, reducing errors from missing or mistyped variables.

items.content_html: Taskify is a lightweight, user-friendly task manager app that helps you manage and organize your tasks with ease. It features task input, task deletion, search functionality, and task completion toggling. All tasks are persisted in the local storage, so they remain saved even after refreshing the page.
items.title: King4584/Taskify: Taskify is a lightweight, user-friendly task manager app that helps you manage and organize your tasks with ease. It features task input, task deletion, search functionality, and task completion toggling. All tasks are persisted in the local storage, so they remain saved even after refreshing the page.
